short.ar,bg,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Watch videos up to 2x faster by automatically skipping long pauses between sentences
short.am: বাক্যগুলির মধ্যে দীর্ঘ বিরতি দ্রুত-ফরওয়ার্ড করে ~1.5x দ্রুত লেকচারগুলি দেখুন৷
short.bn: বাক্যগুলির মধ্যে দীর্ঘ বিরতি দ্রুত-ফরওয়ার্ড করে ~১.৫x দ্রুত লেকচারগুলি দেখুন৷
short.ca: Mireu els vídeos ~ 1.5x més ràpidament avançant pauses llargues entre frases
short.de: Schaue Vorlesungen ~1,5x schneller an, indem lange Pausen zwischen Sätzen vorgespult werden
short.es: Vea vídeos hasta dos veces más rápido saltándose automáticamente las pausas largas entre frases
short.fr: Sauter les parties silencieuses des vidéos, en temps réel
short.hr: Gledaj videa do dvaput brže pomoću preskakanja dugih stanki između rečenica
short.id: Tonton video hingga 2x lebih cepat dengan melewatkan jeda panjang di antara kalimat secara otomatis
short.ja: 文と文の間をスキップすることで2倍速く動画を視聴できます
short.no: Hopper over stille deler i videoer (i sanntid)
short.pl: Oglądaj wykłady ~1,5x szybciej dzięki szybkiemu przewijaniu długich przerw miedzy zdaniami
short.pt_BR: Assista palestras ~1.5x com mais rápidez avançando pausas entre as frases
short.ro: Urmărește cursuri de ~1.5x mai rapid prin a scurta automat pauzele dintre propoziții
short.ru: Смотрите лекции в 1,5x быстрее — проматывает долгие паузы между предложениями
short.sv: Titta på föredrag ~1.5x snabbare genom att hoppa över långa pauser mellan meningar
short.tr: Cümleler arasındaki uzun duraklamaları otomatik olarak atlayarak videoları 2 kata kadar daha hızlı izleyin
short.uk: Промотує тишу у відео, в реальному часі
short.zh_CN: 通过快进句子之间的长时间停顿，观看讲座的速度提高了约1.5倍
short.zh_TW: 透過快進句子之間的長時間停頓，觀看影片的速度提高約 1.5 倍

long.ar,bg,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4:
⏩ Skips (or fast-forwards) silent parts in videos in real time and completely automatically.

🌐 Supports YouTube, Coursera, Twitch, local files, and (almost) any other website.

Useful for watching 👨‍🏫 lectures,🔴 stream recordings (VODs), 🎙️ podcasts, webinars, 📞 call & audio recordings, and other unedited videos where the speakers spend a portion of time on things other than talking.
But even if the video is tightly packed, it can also save a bit of time, so it's generally fine to keep it always on.

🕵️🚫 Fully offline and local. Does not track you or send your data anywhere.

🔃 Easy to turn on and off, without having to reload the page (it's there to save time after all!).

⚙️ Has a lot of different settings, but generally you won't have to constantly tune them or touch them at all.

⌨️ Has a lot of handy shortcuts (hotkeys): control video playback and extension settings without using a mouse (or eyes).

🆓🍺 Completely free, both as in "freedom" and as in "free beer" (at least for now):
Licensed under GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or any later version (AGPL-3.0-or-later) — the most based license out there.
👨‍💻 Source code: https://github.com/WofWca/jumpcutter

---

Inspired by this video by carykh: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQ8orIurGxw
long.am,bn,ro:
Plays silent parts of videos on the page at a faster speed, or skips them entirely.
Useful for watching lectures, stream recordings (VODs), webinars, podcasts, and other unedited videos, where the speakers spend a portion of time on things other than talking.
Can also just control video speed, without skipping silence.
Has hotkeys (keyboard shortcuts).

This is free software licensed under GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or any later version (AGPL-3.0-or-later).
Source code: https://github.com/WofWca/jumpcutter

Inspired by this video by carykh: https://youtu.be/DQ8orIurGxw
long.ca,de,fr,hr,id,lt,no,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,sv,t:
Plays silent parts of videos on the page at a faster speed, or skips them entirely.
Can be useful for watching lectures and other unedited videos.
Can also just control video speed, without skipping silence.
Has hotkeys (keyboard shortcuts).

This is free software licensed under GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or any later version (AGPL-3.0-or-later).
Source code: https://github.com/WofWca/jumpcutter

long.ru,uk:
Проигрывает тихие участки видео на повышенной скорости, или же полностью пропускает их.
Пригодится при просмотре лекций и других необработанных видео.
Также может быть использовано просто для контроля скорости воспроизведения.
Есть горячие клавиши.

Это свободное ПО, распространяется по GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or any later version (AGPL-3.0-or-later).
Исходный код: https://github.com/WofWca/jumpcutter

Идея взята отсюда: https://youtu.be/DQ8orIurGxw
